price: Anaa w’adwen yε wo sε Ɔbodan no mu foͻ no, ne Adwini a yɛadi (anaasε ntwerε a yɛatwerε fa wͻn ho) no ka Yԑn nsԑnkyerԑnee a ԑyԑ nwanwa no ho anaa?
arabic: أَمۡ حَسِبۡتَ أَنَّ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡكَهۡفِ وَٱلرَّقِيمِ كَانُواْ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا عَجَبًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: am ḥasib'ta anna aṣḥāba al-kahfi wal-raqīmi kānū min āyātinā ʿajaban
